DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Revision Letter Sent Investigator Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date revise and resubmit letter was sent to the investigator.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Revision Letter Sent Investigator
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to a writing that contains information about a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people and an act of alteration involving reconsideration and modification of a a written message transmitted to an individual who conducts scientific research.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :A writing that contains information.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of or altering (involving reconsideration and modification).:A written message addressed to a person or organization.:Caused or enabled to go or be conveyed or transmitted.:An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts or/and supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures; monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (i.e., under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject), collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.

Concepts.definition: An act of alteration involving reconsideration and modification.
A written message addressed to a person or organization.
Cause or enable to go or be conveyed or transmitted.

An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
